ygData.subject: Re: Where do we go from here?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... WHOO HOO!!! I suggest Bertoxx, it seems that everyone is on Bertoxx =) I say we clear out the mines of malfunction while we re at it too. That s an
ygData.messageBody:
>Then secondly I think all the gnomes from this one-list, and those who post
>on eq.stratics.com and anyone else who was ever interested in this mystery
>should pick a server, and get together in Akanon and have a good ole
>fashion drunken fishing festival!
>
>Complete with high diving at the great wheel, and lots of just general
>"Gnoming about".

WHOO HOO!!! I suggest Bertoxx, it seems that everyone is on Bertoxx =)
I say we clear out the mines of malfunction while we're at it too.
That's an incredibly good idea you have there! Maybe we can have the Gnome
Force guild invite you all in just for the heck of it too =)
Yeah! And we can have female barbarians dancing in cages!

Catbik Tinkerton
Bertoxx
